title: Oxford® 3 Ring Binders, 2" D Rings, Holds 540 Sheets, ClearVue™ Presentation Binder, Green, 4PK
features: These 4 Packs of green 2 inch Oxford 3-Ring Binders have Slant-D rings that hold 25% more paper than round ring binders (540 sheets each); ClearVue covers on all 3 sides and 2 clear inside pockets
Stock up on binder 4 packs; a great value when planning for budgets, presentations, conferences and more
ClearVue poly overlay lets you customize on all 3 sides for a professional-looking view binder that tells your story from every angle
XtraLife cover hinges resist splitting and tearing at the seams so your binder lasts the school year
PVC-free non-stick material won't lift ink and toner from your cover sheets & pages; your archival files will look fresh year after year
description: This 4 pack of 2" green Oxford 3-Ring Binders have non-locking Slant-D rings that hold up to 540 sheets securely; that's 25% more than typical round-ring binders. Customize on all three sides for a professional-looking finish from any angle. The ClearVue poly overlay is anti-glare so your message will always shine through. Two clear interior pockets make it easy to keep a summary, table of contents, quick-facts or handouts within easy view. Slant-D rings are mounted to the back of your binder so there are no metal rivets on the spine in the spot where your label should be. Our binder material is PVC-free and non-stick so you won't find ink and toner from your graphics clinging to a ruined cover; that's lasting quality AND a better value. Each 3 ring binder has XtraLife cover hinges that resist tearing and splitting at the seams through demanding projects, long semesters or other endurance events.
